mapper.select: /****** [ aps.static.facilityListSelect ] ******/ SELECT A1.COMPANY_CD , A1.BU_CD , A1.WC_CD , A1.WC_NM , A1.WC_MGR , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN A4.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN A4.CODE_NM_CN ELSE A4.CODE_NM END AS WC_MGR_NM , A2.ROUTING_ID , A2.PLANT_CD , A2.RESOURCE_CD , A2.RESOURCE_NM , A2.RESOURCE_TYPE , A2.CAMPUS_CD , A2.CAMPUS_NM , A2.VALID_FROM_DATE , CONVERT(CHAR(10), CONVERT(DATETIME, A2.VALID_TO_DATE), 21) AS VALID_TO_DATE , A2.RESOURCE_EFF_RATE , A2.OVEN_AREA , A2.OVEN_FLAG , A3.ATTB_2_CD AS PROD_PART , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN A6.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN A6.CODE_NM_CN ELSE A6.CODE_NM END PROD_PART_NM , A1.PROD_OR_QC , CASE WHEN 'ko' = @{GV_LANG} THEN A5.CODE_NM_KR WHEN 'cn' = @{GV_LANG} THEN A5.CODE_NM_CN ELSE A5.CODE_NM END PROD_OR_QC_NM , A2.ETCHING_FLAG , A2.CLEANING_FLAG , NULLIF(A2.OVEN_RUN_TIME, 0) / 60 AS OVEN_RUN_TIME , A2.OVEN_WIDTH , A2.OVEN_LENGTH , A2.USE_FLAG FROM TB_MST_WORK_CENTER A1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN TB_MST_RESOURCE A2 WITH(NOLOCK) ON A1.COMPANY_CD = A2.COMPANY_CD AND A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.WC_CD = A2.WC_CD AND A2.VALID_FROM_DATE <= CONVERT(NVARCHAR, DBO.UFN_GETDATE(), 112) AND A2.VALID_TO_DATE >= CONVERT(NVARCHAR, DBO.UFN_GETDATE(), 112) INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE A3 WITH(NOLOCK) ON A1.BU_CD = A3.BU_CD AND A1.ROUTING_ID = A3.CODE_CD AND A3.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2' AND A3.USE_FLAG = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE A4 WITH(NOLOCK) ON A1.BU_CD = A4.BU_CD AND A4.GROUP_CD = 'RESOURCE_TYPE' AND A1.WC_MGR = A4.CODE_CD AND A4.USE_FLAG = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE A5 WITH(NOLOCK) ON A1.BU_CD = A5.BU_CD AND A5.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_OR_QC' AND A1.PROD_OR_QC = A5.CODE_CD AND A4.USE_FLAG = 'Y' INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE A6 WITH(NOLOCK) ON A1.BU_CD = A6.BU_CD AND A6.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_PART' AND A3.ATTB_2_CD = A6.CODE_CD AND A6.USE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE A1.COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND A1.BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND A2.RESOURCE_TYPE = 'M' AND A1.PLANT_CD = 'WF01' AND A2.PLANT_CD = 'WF01' #if($_parameter.prodPart and $_parameter.prodPart != "") AND A3.ATTB_2_CD IN ('$_parameter.prodPart.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.workplaces and $_parameter.workplaces != "") AND A1.WC_CD IN ('$_parameter.workplaces.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.campus and $_parameter.campus != "") AND A2.CAMPUS_CD IN ('$_parameter.campus.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.ovenFlag and $_parameter.ovenFlag != "") AND A2.OVEN_FLAG = ('$_parameter.ovenFlag.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.facility and $_parameter.facility != "") AND (A2.RESOURCE_CD LIKE '%'+@{facility}+'%' OR A2.RESOURCE_NM LIKE '%'+@{facility}+'%') #end #if($_parameter.route and $_parameter.route != "") AND A2.ROUTING_ID IN ('$_parameter.route.replace(",","','")') #end #if($_parameter.prodOrQc and $_parameter.prodOrQc != "") AND A1.PROD_OR_QC IN ('$_parameter.prodOrQc.replace(",","','")') #end ORDER BY A6.SORT, WC_CD, RESOURCE_TYPE, RESOURCE_CD, CAMPUS_CD

/****** [ aps.static.facilityRoutingSelect ] ******/ DECLARE @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE NVARCHAR(10); DECLARE @COMMON_DETAIL_ROLE_CNT INT; -- 사용자가 가진 공통권한과 세부권한 개수를 세어 공통권한과 세부권한을 2개 이상가지고 있을 경우 권한 부여하지 않기 위한변수
-- 공통권한인지 세부 권한 인부 구분하여 TB_MST_CODE테이블 GRP_CODE:PROD_L2, ATTB8_CD/ATTB9_CD 중 어느 CODE를 참조할지 분기 타기 위한 변수 SELECT @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE = ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ROLE_CD IN ('PRO0009','PRO0010', 'PRO0011')
SELECT @COMMON_DETAIL_ROLE_CNT = COUNT(*) FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' AND ROLE_CD IN ('PRO0006','PRO0007', 'PRO0008', 'PRO0009','PRO0010', 'PRO0011')
IF @COMMON_DETAIL_ROLE_CNT >= 1 AND @COMMON_DETAIL_ROLE_CNT < 2 BEGIN
IF @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE = 'PRO0009' OR @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE='PRO0010' OR @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE='PRO0011' BEGIN
SELECT MC.CODE_CD FROM(
SELECT A2.ROLE_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD IN ('APS10201', 'APS10202', 'APS10203', 'APS10204') AND ACTION_CD = 'SAVE' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.ROLE_CD ) R INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON R.ROLE_CD = MC.ATTB_9_CD AND MC.BU_CD = 'QT' AND MC.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2'
END ELSE BEGIN
SELECT MC.CODE_CD FROM(
SELECT A2.ROLE_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD IN ('APS10201', 'APS10202', 'APS10203', 'APS10204') AND ACTION_CD = 'SAVE' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.ROLE_CD ) R INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON R.ROLE_CD = MC.ATTB_8_CD AND MC.BU_CD = 'QT' AND MC.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2' END
END
IF @{GV_USER_ID} = '00602' BEGIN
IF @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE = 'PRO0009' OR @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE='PRO0010' OR @DIFFUSION_LAM_TEL_COMMON_ROLE='PRO0011' BEGIN
SELECT MC.CODE_CD FROM(
SELECT A2.ROLE_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD IN ('APS10201', 'APS10202', 'APS10203', 'APS10204') AND ACTION_CD = 'SAVE' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.ROLE_CD ) R INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON R.ROLE_CD = MC.ATTB_9_CD AND MC.BU_CD = 'QT' AND MC.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2'
END ELSE BEGIN
SELECT MC.CODE_CD FROM(
SELECT A2.ROLE_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD IN ('APS10201', 'APS10202', 'APS10203', 'APS10204') AND ACTION_CD = 'SAVE' AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.ROLE_CD ) R INNER JOIN TB_MST_CODE MC WITH(NOLOCK) ON R.ROLE_CD = MC.ATTB_8_CD AND MC.BU_CD = 'QT' AND MC.GROUP_CD = 'PROD_L2' END
END
